content: Una stufa mi scalda e una partita a scacchi mi tiene compagnia: nonostante gli sforzi eroici del alfiere, il bianco stasera perderà.
translations: eng:A stove keeps me warm and a game of chess keeps me company﹕ despite the heroic efforts of the bishop, white will lose to
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
